meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or constituting numbers.
meanings.sent1: The teacher explained the numeric value of each shape.
meanings.sent2: She used numeric symbols to solve the math problem.
meanings.sent3: The numeric puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a numeric machine, calculating everything instantly.
meanings.sent5: The numeric concept was as clear as a sunny day.

meanings.sent1: The chart had a numeric representation of the data.
meanings.sent2: The graph showed a clear numeric relationship between the variables.
meanings.sent3: The numeric diagram made the information easy to understand.
meanings.sent4: Her words painted a numeric picture of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The numeric illustration was like a map guiding us through the numbers.

meanings.sent1: She wrote down the numeric of the winning lottery ticket.
meanings.sent2: The numeric on the clock showed it was time to go.
meanings.sent3: The numeric on the door was the secret code to enter.
meanings.sent4: His phone number was a numeric that she would never forget.
meanings.sent5: The numeric on the scoreboard determined the winner of the game.
